Jersey Vintages

Welcome

Dinoestadio - football shirt

We are Dinoestadio, a specialty store for classic and vintage football shirts from clubs and national teams around the world. Our collection features rare editions, retro designs, and iconic jerseys full of history.

We ship worldwide and offer competitive prices - it's the perfect time to find your next favorite piece of football nostalgia.

JerseyBangJKT Vol.1: Football & Culture Exhibition

Dinoestadio is present at JerseyBangJKT Vol.1 to celebrate football culture through a collection of vintage football shirts. This event serves as a platform for jersey and lifestyle enthusiasts from various communities.

Dinoestadio is present at JerseyBangJKT Vol.1 to celebrate football culture through a collection of vintage football shirts. This event serves as a platform for jersey and lifestyle enthusiasts from various communities.

Your Trusted Source for Classic Football Culture & Vintage Kits

Welcome to Dinoestadio — where timeless football heritage meets authentic vintage style. Whether you're searching for a legendary 90s Serie A shirt, a rare international jersey, or a match-worn piece of football history, you'll find it here. Our collection is curated with passion by fans, for fans. Every shirt is 100% genuine and authenticated — because we believe every piece has a story to tell. From iconic World Cup classics to retro club kits, each drop brings the game’s history back to life.

At Dinoestadio, we don’t just sell shirts — we keep football’s legacy alive. So sit back, explore, and relive your favorite football eras, one shirt at a time.

Football Stories

Dive into timeless football memories as legends revisit the shirts that defined eras. Each kit carries a legacy — a symbol of pride, passion, and unforgettable moments on the pitch.

Episode 1 – Pelé: The Black Pearl
Episode 2 – El Fenómeno: Ronaldo at Inter
Episode 3 – Football's Quiet Genius

Why choose Dinoestadio?

Every shirt is checked and authenticated before listing. We sell only original and officially licensed shirts.

We ship worldwide with secure and tracked delivery services.

Ask us and we’ll provide the exact size details of the shirt.

Thousands of happy customers have rated us 5 stars!

We’re happy to help with sizing, condition, and history!

Got vintage shirts to sell? Contact us for a fair deal.
